title: p4nd41024
author: p4nd41024
created_time: November 19, 2022, 01:00:39 PMLast edit: November 20, 2022, 01:41:36 PM by p4nd41024
content: First I ask two questions, because I saw someone discussing it in the forum1.telegram dice stickers Is it possible to control it, or know its outcome in advance2.If it is impossible to control it and its result cannot be known in advance, is it possible to roughly calculate the probability of 80% of its next time through big dataI know it seems hard, but after all it's just a random function control https://core.telegram.org/api/diceRegardless of whether you have the ability to modify telegram dice stickers or not, if you can complete this project through introduction, I will reward you with $10,000, or pay $500 a day for 2-5 years. Members are welcome to help me spread the wordIn addition, I want to explain that friendly-telegram is of no use.Because someone asked me such a question yesterday, I will make a supplementary question and introduce myselfWhy do I need to find you when I can control the dice?I'm from China, I work in the government system, an executive of the army organized an online casino, this casino only exists within the government, civil servants, need someone to introduce and have a clear identity authentication to enter, every time the dice is thrown 2 minutes apart, Every day from 9:00 am to 11:00 pm nonstop, betting up to $100,000 per bet, and I am the one who can enterThis is the meaning of my existenceExpect bounty hunters to contact me and not a bunch of scammers because you can't fool me Â   https://i.postimg.cc/mrzVSGpD/C5-FBAC26-C15-A-45-FD-8383-314-F5-D19-B418.jpg

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Do you mean dice bot? Stickers on telegram doesnâ€™t have this kind of function. Dice bot is just coded so the developers can control the outcome base the code that he writes on the bot. You should move this topic on Marketplace>Services since you are looking for someone who will write a code for you to create a telegram Dice bot. I know that that you are just using google translate that makes your statement a little bit hard to understand.Edit:It seems that you are looking for someone who will hack the casino bot code. Itâ€™s not possible if the bot code is not open source though.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: p4nd41024 on November 19, 2022, 02:54:56 PMVery humorous answer, I also want to contact the developers, but they are all anonymous. If you have time, you can tell them for me. I will prepare an extra 5,000 US dollars for them every day.hahhahahWhy do you say that all Telegram developers are anonymous? QuoteQ: Who are the people behind Telegram?Telegram is supported by Pavel Durov and his brother Nikolai. Pavel supports Telegram financially and ideologically while Nikolai's input is technological. To make Telegram possible, Nikolai developed a unique custom data protocol, which is open, secure and optimized for work with multiple data-centers. As a result, Telegram combines security, reliability and speed on any network.https://telegram.org/faqFor the rest of your post, I call bullshit. Even if someone were willing to work with you, how could they trust you? Are you willing put the money where your mouth is and to use a reputable escrow?

comments.body: So let me see if i get this right.You are looking for someone to work with the Chinese Communist Party secret gambling ring to break and exploit the telegram dice API for someone else to take advantage of it?And also you wante someone who would be willing to dox themselves as a part of the job? Not offense, the fact you are looking for someone to exploit such thing is a bit shady and you letting us that the CCP is involved just make it worse...

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: @p4nd41024 I believe you are new to this forum and this thread is probably the first you started..I want to (not without humility) tell you that the posting style you used above is prohibited on this forum, when you make a comment on a discussion thread as this, it is mandatory to allow other users post a comment(s) after yours before you post another comment, that is, your comment must not be more than one in a roll.When you have a alot of comment you wish to reply to, you can reply each of them with a quote in a single comment, or you can post a general reply in a single comment without quoting any user..Like I said before, you are new and probably did not know this, now you know, please avoid making same mistake to avoid a tem ban.

comments.author: p4nd41024
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 20, 2022, 02:24:30 PM@p4nd41024 I believe you are new to this forum and this thread is probably the first you started..I want to (not without humility) tell you that the posting style you used above is prohibited on this forum, when you make a comment on a discussion thread as this, it is mandatory to allow other users post a comment(s) after yours before you post another comment, that is, your comment must not be more than one in a roll.When you have a alot of comment you wish to reply to, you can reply each of them with a quote in a single comment, or you can post a general reply in a single comment without quoting any user..Like I said before, you are new and probably did not know this, now you know, please avoid making same mistake to avoid a tem ban. ok, I have understood, I will pay attention to this problem next time thanks for your reminder

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: p4nd41024 on November 20, 2022, 02:31:02 PMQuote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 20, 2022, 02:24:30 PM@p4nd41024 I believe you are new to this forum and this thread is probably the first you started..I want to (not without humility) tell you that the posting style you used above is prohibited on this forum, when you make a comment on a discussion thread as this, it is mandatory to allow other users post a comment(s) after yours before you post another comment, that is, your comment must not be more than one in a roll.When you have a alot of comment you wish to reply to, you can reply each of them with a quote in a single comment, or you can post a general reply in a single comment without quoting any user..Like I said before, you are new and probably did not know this, now you know, please avoid making same mistake to avoid a tem ban. ok, I have understood, I will pay attention to this problem next time thanks for your reminder I think you still didn't understand OP what Sir@Fivestar4everMVP said, as he said in what he mentioned above "Your comment must not be more than 1 in a roll" but you still did it on the roll page that you already have You answered 3 comments.Anyway, it looks like you're serious about what you're saying, so to make this topic you made here real and credible, it's really good that you post a topic in the marketing section of this forum and put it there or post that you're looking for a developer that can help what you want to happen, and put it where you can talk to those who will inquire about it, don't tell other members here that if they know a developer they will refer you, don't do it this way dude Please follow the correct rules of this forum.

comments.author: dezoel
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on November 19, 2022, 11:10:23 PMF*ck that font color, can you change it to black, why red always be the color theme for china?I tried to play the dice emoji and looks like it could be use for betting, but the code of this are centralized and with always br in a random outcome. Unless you contacted telegram devs/support[1] and request to change things for you or make an offer.[1] https://telegram.org/supportGreat that he follow your command but there is still a problem here. He is now using bold text in his sentence. You ask why red is always associated in China? Well, I guess that is because the colour of their flag is also red . I think this dice emoji is bad to use for betting because like you said it is centralized so there is no way to win on it.Contacting the telegram dev, and bribing them money only to make the game in favour with us sounds ridiculous and I don't think telegram devs are that corrupt to agree with that conditions. I bet that they are already making enough money but in a more fairer way so there is no need for them to risk their reputation here.
